short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple yet powerful tab management toolkit

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple tab management extension.

----
This extension is currently in active development. If you encounter any issues, please report them to contact@saltynote.com. Your feedback is valuable and helps me improve the extension.

⚠️ Important: Uninstalling this extension will permanently delete all your saved data.
----


This extension will auto track your each page(url) view count and last view time when chrome tab is created or activated, and group them by the url host name, so in the dashboard(the extension option page), you will be easily informed about what are you most viewed pages, and your most recent viewed pages.

Privacy: All these data are saved locally into browser built-in IndexedDB, and will not be synced to the cloud.
